name: Eonic Savant
description: The Eonic Savant is a humanoid with an exceptional Intelligence score of 20, wielding a Time Warping Staff and capable of manipulating time.
memorable: Its ability to create past and future versions of itself during combat and to concentrate on two spells simultaneously makes it highly unpredictable.
goals: To engage in combat using its spellcasting and time manipulation abilities.
relations: Eonic Savants can be encountered alongside other humanoids or spellcasters, potentially as allies or foes.
environment: Often found in arcane settings or locations rich in magic.
strengths: High Intelligence and the ability to resist magic through Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Below average Strength and Wisdom scores, making it less proficient in physical combat and willpower-related tasks.
attacks: Makes three melee attacks with its Time Warping Staff, dealing bludgeoning and force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Past and Future, Present, allowing the savant to buffer damage and cast multiple spells at once.
equipment: Time Warping Staff, which deals both bludgeoning and force damage.
skills: Proficient in arcana and history, with strong spellcasting capabilities.
additional_information: Has the ability to grant advantage or disadvantage on attacks through Amend Time.
Always accompanied by past and future versions of itself.
9th-level spellcaster with a diverse spell repertoire.
Can absorb damage through its past and future selves.
spellcasting: 9th-level wizard with prepared spells including fireball, counterspell, and dimension door.
test_queries: humanoid that manipulates time and casts spells
intelligent creature with time manipulation abilities
powerful wizard with future copies in combat
spellcaster with multiattack and damage mitigation
formidable humanoid known for arcane knowledge
